channel.title: Convertify - Size Conversion Tools
channel.description: Latest updates and new features from Convertify - Free online size conversion tools

item.title: New Shoe Size Converter Launched
item.description: Convert between US, EU, UK shoe sizes instantly with our new accurate conversion tool. Features printable charts and mobile optimization.

item.title: Privacy Policy Updated
item.description: Read our updated privacy policy to understand how we protect your data and ensure your privacy while using Convertify tools.

item.title: Contact Convertify
item.description: Have questions or feedback? Contact the Convertify team for support and suggestions about our size conversion tools.

item.title: Length Converter Coming Soon
item.description: We're working on a new length conversion tool to convert between inches, cm, feet, meters and more. Stay tuned for updates!

item.title: Clothing Size Converter in Development
item.description: Our team is developing a comprehensive clothing size converter for international size conversions. Expected launch in early 2025.
